Html: I noticed that the site has a link with an MIT license.  This license is very friendly for my organizations needs.  When I downloaded the source however (due to complex requirements our solution requires source) I noticed a completely different license.  Creative Commons license is not friendly for our needs.  I know the lawyers will have issues with this so could you please clarify the website link or modify the downloaded source package with the correct license?  Thanks!

Hi Scott,

Codeplex doesn't support Creative Commons license, so this is why there is are different licences. In future releases we plan to switch to GPL. If you need a different license please send us an email and describe your product briefly.
